caption.p: Schematic illustration of the main sugars content in pomegranate juice from different varieties grown in Tunis, Turkey, Spain, and Israel. The values presented are average values of the percentage of each sugar of the total amount of sugars measured by Melgarejo et al. ( 2000); Tzulker et al. ( 2007); Hasnaoui et al. ( 2011); Caliskan and Bayazit ( 2012).
